channel.title: Portfolio on Digital Sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Digital Sandbox

item.title: Air quality monitoring
item.description: Collects and visualizes the air quality data for the city Osijek. Technologies: C++ and CMake

item.title: Block jump
item.description: 2D jump-and-run platformer game with a multiplayer option and map editor. Technologies: C++, Bazel and Golang

item.title: Digital paper
item.description: Blog web application which allows creating and managing posts and users. Technologies: Golang and React

item.title: Game of life
item.description: Desktop application which visualizes the cellular automaton algorithm. Technologies: C++ and Bazel

item.title: Super-Duper weather station
item.description: An ESP8266 based weather station with an accompanying server and visualization application. Technologies: C++ (Arduino), Golang and Rust
